title: Catboost dependence plot not working on categorical features (strings)

labels.name: todo
labels.description: This issue had an outstanding action to take.

body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7490453/84959594-a4ecfb80-b0cd-11ea-88f3-19b37a99b15d.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7490453/84959633-c221ca00-b0cd-11ea-87a0-a4db60f3c66b.png)

```
shap.dependence_plot("FireplaceQu", shap_values, Xt)
```
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-21-c8250da05cbf> in <module>
----> 1 shap.dependence_plot("FireplaceQu", shap_values, Xt)

/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/plots/dependence.py in dependence_plot(ind, shap_values, features, feature_names, display_features, interaction_index, color, axis_color, cmap, dot_size, x_jitter, alpha, title, xmin, xmax, ax, show)
    106     if not hasattr(ind, "__len__"):
    107         if interaction_index == "auto":
--> 108             interaction_index = approximate_interactions(ind, shap_values, features)[0]
    109         interaction_index = convert_name(interaction_index, shap_values, feature_names)
    110     categorical_interaction = False

/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/shap/common.py in approximate_interactions(index, shap_values, X, feature_names)
    305     interactions = []
    306     for i in range(X.shape[1]):
--> 307         val_other = X[inds, i][srt].astype(np.float)
    308         v = 0.0
    309         if not (i == index or np.sum(np.abs(val_other)) < 1e-8):

ValueError: could not convert string to float: 'RL'
